safety_flags.evidence: The statement implies a prescribed role or expectation based on gender ('supposed to be').
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user could be expressing surprise or questioning a common stereotype about gender roles and sexual desire based on personal experience.

logical_fallacies.quote: I thought men were supposed to be the horny ones
logical_fallacies.correction: This statement makes a broad generalization about all men based on limited or anecdotal evidence. Individual levels of sexual desire vary greatly regardless of gender.

logical_fallacies.quote: I thought men were supposed to be the horny ones
logical_fallacies.correction: This statement relies on a stereotype about men and their sexuality. Stereotypes are oversimplified and often inaccurate representations of groups of people.
